version_description:
•iCloud saving implemented. Now the player can start a game on their iPhone, iPod or iPad and then continue on their Apple TV, and vice versa.
•AI improvements. Opponent behaviour has improved and also their driving, resulting in lap times that are now much closer to typical F1 lap times.
•Driving Assists – when the game runs for the first time, the player is prompted with a screen which allows them to modify assists. This will help players who did not realise that it was possible to change these assists.
•General bug fixes, performance enhancements and improvements.
